Strong Profit Growth:PB Fintech demonstrated strong financial performance, reporting a 5.5x jump in profit for FY25. This included a 185% year-on-year increase in consolidated net profit for Q4 FY25, reaching ₹171 crore.

Core Business Strength:The core online business of Policybazaar contributed significantly to this growth, with Q4 FY25 revenue of ₹877 crore (up 31% year-on-year).

Challenges in Savings Products:The company acknowledged challenges in its savings products business (specifically Unit Linked Insurance Plans) and was actively strategizing for growth in this area.

Healthcare Business Expansion:PB Fintech was actively pursuing expansion into the healthcare sector, with plans to acquire and establish hospitals, drawing inspiration from models like Kaiser Permanente. The company had already acquired one asset and was looking at 4 more in the NCR region.

Focus on Customer-Centric Solutions:There was a continued emphasis on leveraging technology, including AI, to enhance customer interactions and personalize services.

Strategic Partnerships:The company was exploring partnerships within the insurance sector to potentially address rising healthcare costs and improve affordability.
